main.java.ch.hszt.hs_2010.mdp.HGHM.Controller
Class AbstractController

java.lang.Object
  main.java.ch.hszt.hs_2010.mdp.HGHM.Controller.AbstractController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
Controller
public abstract class AbstractController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener

This class provides base level functionality for each controller. This includes the ability to register multiple models and views, propogating model change events to each of the views, and providing a utility funktion to broadcast model property changes when necessary

Author:
david

Method Detail

addModel

public void addModel(AbstractModel model)
Binds a model to this controller. The controller listen for all model property changes of all registered model and propagate them on registred views.

Parameters:
model -

Unbinds a model from this controller

addView

public void addView(IViewStrategy view)
Binds a view to this controller. The controller lister for all view property changes of all registered view and propagate changes to each view for consideration

Parameters:
view -

propertyChange

public void propertyChange(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt)
This method is used to implement the PropertyChangeListener interface. Any model changes will be sent to this controller through the use of this method.

Specified by:
propertyChange in interface java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
Parameters:
evt - An object that describes the model's property change.
